name: Muck Arctic Ice Arctic Grip Tall Winter Boots - Men's
categories: Arctic Ice Arctic Grip Tall Winter Boots
description: Equipped with Vibram Arctic Ice tread, these boots don’t loose grip when walking on slick, icy terrain. The rubber sole keeps you surefooted, and the thick neoprene and soft fleece keep your feet warm on winter’s worst days. Muck’s stretch-fit cuff keeps them snug to your legs to keep warm in and the cold out. All things a great winter boot should be.Vibram Arctic Grip outsole provides incredible traction on wet ice. Aggressive tread pattern and deep lugs provide traction everywhere else.Lined with a soft and cozy fleece.5mm of supple neoprene lets you move comfortably and keeps you warm.Rugged rubber exterior is durable and easy to clean.Large pull loop makes it easy to get your boots on and off.
